snippet: A top United Nations official has added his voice to American concerns that the Syrian government is deliberately stalling the removal of chemical weapons.

byline.original: By RICK GLADSTONE, NICK CUMMING-BRUCE and ALAN COWELL

lead_paragraph: A top United Nations official has added his voice to American concerns that the Syrian government is deliberately stalling the removal of chemical weapons.

headline.main: Clamor Grows for Syria to Deliver on Chemical Arms Pledge

keywords.value: Organization for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons
keywords.name: organizations
